title: [Citrine Street]
description: Angular boxwood hedge walls loom to the north and south, bringing the street to an abrupt terminus at its western end.  A knobby pebble path leads away from a thin gap in the hedge.

Angular boxwood hedge walls loom to the north and south, bringing the street to an abrupt terminus at its western end.  A knobby pebble path leads away from a thin gap in the hedge into the cool shade beyond.
